fields.name: Usage: /requestrole <role>
fields.value: If the **role** is requestable, this command will give it to you. If you already have that role, it will instead be removed. Some roles may require you to consent to an agreement before receiving them.

fields.name: Usage: /requestrole <role> [duration]
fields.value: Some roles may only be temporarily obtainable. For these roles, the **duration** must be specified. The maximum duration is 30 days.
